name: Superposition - TTC Series 01 Tweetcart 03
description:
The third tweetcart for the Tweetcart Token Club (TTC)!
A generative art piece in a single tweet worth of code.
New piece is generated every 5 seconds.

To be airdropped on January 1st 2022 to the holders of the Tweetcart Token Club token: hicetnunc objkt #414400


Source Code: 
poke(0x5f54,0x60)r=rnd
s=r(-1)srand(s)cls()::_::
for x=0,128,32do
for y=0,128,32do
circ(x,y,r(10)+1,r({8,12,1}))w=r(16)h=r(16)sspr(x-8+w,y-8+h,w,h,y-8+w,x-8+h,w,h)circ(x,y,r(10)+1,r({8,12,1}))
end end
if(r()>0.8)srand(s)
if(t()%5<=0.01)extcmd("reset")
goto _


Bonus Metadata:
creator: Andrew E. Brereton
date: 2021-12-26
twitter: @aebrer
website: aebrer.xyz
medium: Pico-8, Lua

Controls: 
when viewing the live view (on IPFS) in its own window, press ctrl+6 to save a screenshot, or ctrl+9 to save a gif
